thread.section_title: The Darlington Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great stay!
thread.title_full: Great stay! - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Charlene Z
title: Great stay!
text: Nothing bad to say about this hotel. Staff are welcoming and polite. Room was spotless and exceptionally quiet (it was towards the back of the building). Cooked breakfast was available upon request. Very convenient location with a bus stop in front of the hotel and Paddington station just around the corner. Very pleased overall.
